name: Crime Scene:Reconstruction of crime
description:
Crime Scene:Reconstruction will allow you to become a real CSI agent.
You should investigate into crime scenes via VR and search hiddened evidences.
Also, you have to reconstruct the criminal cases to indentify criminals by using your case board based on evidences you collected.

Starting with the first episode, you will have more to enjoy in the upcoming updates.

Features:
  • Crime reconstruction based on real criminal cases
  • Fully interactive objects and realistic graphics
  • Using a variety of real CSI tools
  • Reflected real CSI methods supported by CSI agents
